How Canopy works.text: uses them to produce build data
How Canopy works.targetSubtopic: Uses them to produce build data

How Canopy works.text: the front-end client uses to build a web interface
How Canopy works.targetSubtopic: The front-end client uses to build a web interface

Uses them to produce build data.text: The build process produces JSON files that tell the front-end client how to render the paragraphs of the project.

The front-end client uses to build a web.text: The web interface requests the default topic, and uses it to render the initial page.

The user interacts with it.text: When the user select a new link, the Canopy web interface rerenders the page.
